meanings.definition: The act of giving a title or name to something.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the titling of her new novel.
meanings.sent2: The titling of the book took longer than expected.
meanings.sent3: The titling of the cat as 'Fluffy' made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The titling of the ship as 'The Mighty Wave' was fitting for its grandeur.
meanings.sent5: His titling of the painting brought out its true essence.

meanings.definition: The process of creating a title for a piece of writing or artwork.
meanings.sent1: The titling of the essay was the final step in completing it.
meanings.sent2: She struggled with the titling of her latest masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The titling of the sculpture as 'Dancing Flames' added a touch of whimsy.
meanings.sent4: The titling of the poem was like finding the perfect puzzle piece.
meanings.sent5: His titling of the play captured the audience's attention instantly.
